snippet.title: Brookhaven Grimoire Trailer
snippet.description:
Brookhaven is a RPG, adventure, and dating sim that's inspired by Harvest Moon, DnD, and The Magicians series.

A Wizard has trapped you in a storybook, transporting you to the magical town of Brookhaven. With spells, swords, and the power of friendship, begin your new life in this strange land. 

Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1499240/Brookhaven/

Follow on Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/brookhaven_official/

Follow on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/Brookhaven
